Writer: Jayamohan (tamil dialogue), Lakshmi Saravanakumar (additional tamil dialogue), S. Shankar, Abbas Tyrewala (hindi dialogue)
Actors: Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson, Sudhanshu Pandey
Plot: After facing a threat that is beyond the current understanding of science, the Government seeks the help of scientists. Dr. Vaseegaran suggests to assemble Chitti to fight against it.
